import axios from"axios";var BASEURL="https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q=";export default{// Get all books
getBooks:function getBooks(){return axios.get("/books");},// Get the book with the given id
getCertainBook:function getCertainBook(id){return axios.get("/books/"+id);},// Deletes Specific book 
deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/books/"+id);},// Save book
saveBook:function saveBook(BookData){return axios.post("/books",BookData);},// search Google books
search:function search(title){return axios.get(BASEURL+title);}};
